Protocols/DFSearchIndexAsyncControllerPr.name: DFSearchIndexAsyncControllerProtocol
Protocols/DFSearchIndexAsyncControllerPr.abstract: Protocol for notifying a delegate when the operation queue changes state

Enums/DFIndexType.html#/c:@M@dfsearchind.name: invertedVector
Enums/DFIndexType.html#/c:@M@dfsearchind.abstract: Index type with all the capabilities of an inverted and a vector index (kSKIndexInvertedVector)

Enums/DFIndexType.html.name: DFIndexType
Enums/DFIndexType.html.abstract: The type of index to create. Maps directly onto SKIndexType

Classes/DFSearchIndexFile.html#/c:@M@dfs.name: fileURL
Classes/DFSearchIndexFile.html#/c:@M@dfs.abstract: The file url where the index is located

Classes/DFSearchIndexFile.html#/c:@M@dfs.name: open(from:writable:)
Classes/DFSearchIndexFile.html#/c:@M@dfs.abstract: Open an index from a file url.

Classes/DFSearchIndexFile.html#/c:@M@dfs.name: create(with:properties:)
Classes/DFSearchIndexFile.html#/c:@M@dfs.abstract: Create an indexer using a new data container for the store

Classes/DFSearchIndexData.html#/c:@M@dfs.name: create(properties:)
Classes/DFSearchIndexData.html#/c:@M@dfs.abstract: Create an indexer using a new data container for the store

Classes/DFSearchIndexData.html#/c:@M@dfs.name: load(from:)
Classes/DFSearchIndexData.html#/c:@M@dfs.abstract: Create an indexer using the data stored in ‘data’.

Classes/DFSearchIndexData.html#/c:@M@dfs.name: save()
Classes/DFSearchIndexData.html#/c:@M@dfs.abstract: Returns the index content as a (copied) Swift Data object

Classes/DFSearchIndexAsyncController/Sea.name: query
Classes/DFSearchIndexAsyncController/Sea.abstract: The search term used to create the task

Classes/DFSearchIndexAsyncController.htm.name: cancelCurrent(_:)
Classes/DFSearchIndexAsyncController.htm.abstract: Cancel all the outstanding requests if they haven’t already been started.

Classes/DFSearchIndexAsyncController.htm.name: waitUntilQueueIsComplete(_:)
Classes/DFSearchIndexAsyncController.htm.abstract: Call back when the operation queue is complete (ie. empty)

Classes/DFSearchIndexAsyncController.htm.name: addText(async:flushWhenComplete:complete:)
Classes/DFSearchIndexAsyncController.htm.abstract: Add text elements to the index asynchronously

Classes/DFSearchIndexAsyncController.htm.name: addURLs(async:flushWhenComplete:complete:)
Classes/DFSearchIndexAsyncController.htm.abstract: Add file urls to the index asynchronously.

Classes/DFSearchIndexAsyncController.htm.name: prune(complete:)
Classes/DFSearchIndexAsyncController.htm.abstract: Remove all documents with zero terms from the index

Classes/DFSearchIndex/ProgressiveSearch/.name: moreResultsAvailable
Classes/DFSearchIndex/ProgressiveSearch/.abstract: A boolean indicating whether more search results are available

Classes/DFSearchIndex/ProgressiveSearch/.name: results
Classes/DFSearchIndex/ProgressiveSearch/.abstract: The partial results for the search request

Classes/DFSearchIndex/SearchResult.html#.name: score
Classes/DFSearchIndex/SearchResult.html#.abstract: The search ‘score’ for the document result. Higher means more relevant

Classes/DFSearchIndex/CreateProperties.h.name: init(indexType:proximityIndexing:stopWords:minTermLength:)
Classes/DFSearchIndex/CreateProperties.h.abstract: Create a properties object with the specified creation parameters

Classes/DFSearchIndex/CreateProperties.h.name: CreateProperties
Classes/DFSearchIndex/CreateProperties.h.abstract: Container for storing the properties to be used when creating a new index

Classes/DFSearchIndex.html#/c:@CM@dfsear.name: add(url:mimeType:canReplace:)
Classes/DFSearchIndex.html#/c:@CM@dfsear.abstract: Add a file as a document to the index

Classes/DFSearchIndex.html#/c:@CM@dfsear.name: addFolderContent(folderURL:canReplace:)
Classes/DFSearchIndex.html#/c:@CM@dfsear.abstract: Recursively add the files contained within a folder to the search index

Classes/DFSearchIndex.html#/c:@CM@dfsear.name: remove(urls:)
Classes/DFSearchIndex.html#/c:@CM@dfsear.abstract: Remove an array of documents from the index

Classes/DFSearchIndex.html#/c:@CM@dfsear.name: documentState(_:)
Classes/DFSearchIndex.html#/c:@CM@dfsear.abstract: Returns the indexing state for the specified URL.

Classes/DFSearchIndex.html#/c:@CM@dfsear.name: documentIndexed(_:)
Classes/DFSearchIndex.html#/c:@CM@dfsear.abstract: Returns true if the document represented by url has been indexed, false otherwise.

Classes/DFSearchIndex.html#/c:@CM@dfsear.name: setDocumentProperties(_:properties:)
Classes/DFSearchIndex.html#/c:@CM@dfsear.abstract: Sets additional properties for the document which are retained in the index.

Classes/DFSearchIndex/TermCount.html.name: TermCount
Classes/DFSearchIndex/TermCount.html.abstract: A class to contain a term and the count of times it appears

Classes/DFSearchIndex.html#/c:@CM@dfsear.name: documents(termState:)
Classes/DFSearchIndex.html#/c:@CM@dfsear.abstract: Returns all the document URLs loaded into the index matching the specified term state

Classes/DFSearchIndex.html#/c:@CM@dfsear.name: termCount(for:)
Classes/DFSearchIndex.html#/c:@CM@dfsear.abstract: Returns the number of terms for the specified document url

Classes/DFSearchIndex.html#/c:@CM@dfsear.name: isEmpty(for:)
Classes/DFSearchIndex.html#/c:@CM@dfsear.abstract: Is the specified document empty (ie. it has no terms)

Classes/DFSearchIndex.html#/c:@CM@dfsear.name: terms(for:)
Classes/DFSearchIndex.html#/c:@CM@dfsear.abstract: Returns an array containing the terms and counts for a specified URL

Classes/DFSearchIndex.html#/c:@CM@dfsear.name: flush()
Classes/DFSearchIndex.html#/c:@CM@dfsear.abstract: Flush any pending commands to the search index. A flush should ALWAYS be called before performing a search

Classes/DFSearchIndex.html#/c:@CM@dfsear.name: compact()
Classes/DFSearchIndex.html#/c:@CM@dfsear.abstract: Reduce the size of the index where possible.

Classes/DFSearchIndex.html#/c:@CM@dfsear.name: prune(progress:)
Classes/DFSearchIndex.html#/c:@CM@dfsear.abstract: Remove any documents that have no search terms

Classes/DFSearchIndexAsyncController.htm.name: DFSearchIndexAsyncController
Classes/DFSearchIndexAsyncController.htm.abstract: A controller for a DFSearchIndex object that supports asynchronous calls to the index

Classes/DFSearchIndexData.html.name: DFSearchIndexData
Classes/DFSearchIndexData.html.abstract: A memory-based index using NSMutableData as the backing.
